item.title: How to do deep learning using custom Jupyter kernels on Sherlock
item.author: Author
item.description: A recipe for interactive computing using custom Jupyter kernels on Stanford’s Sherlock. Setting up custom conda environment on Sherlock’s login node 1. Download and install Miniconda 1 2 3 4 wget https://repo.
